title: オールカマーにむけて

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I've been in good form lately.
I wanna win—can I win?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Heheh, you're late!!
You're late, Machitan!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh!?
Really? I was just going at my usual pace...

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: You were slower than Turbo! So the race to get to the track is Turbo's win!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ha!
Oh, so the competition's already started!?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Yep! Turbo's super energetic today!
So I'm definitely gonna win the race too!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Turbo'll teach you what racing's all about!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: So in other words, this is a declaration of war!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I've received Turbo's serious challenge!
Hmm...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I can't lose to this one!
